function ERU_EP04_01()
    -- .序章-1【10月第2週】「“姫皇”を探して」
    -- 【指示説明】

    -- 　//BG：背景の指定
    -- 　//BU：バストアップの指定
    -- 　//SE：効果音の指定
    -- 　//CI：カットインの指定
    -- 　//effect：演出の希望
    -- 　◆：シーン切り替え
    -- 　￥：黒塗りハートの記号（主にエルメスが多用）

    -- 第４話「ボク姫様と姫皇ちゃん」
    -- 12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890
    SaveData.Title = "“姫皇”を探して"

SAVE()

    -- //BG：メインストリート（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019cc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    -- //SE：虫の鳴き声・ループ開始
PLAY_SE("SEe005.wav",1000,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1286.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】通常
 "I guess it’s about time for our breath to start turning white." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：歩く音
PLAY_SE("SEa016.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ I keep walking through the school at night, with the chorus of insects all around. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s already been two weeks since the intense Princess Election battle with Uran-san at the Hakuyou Festival. ]])

    MSG([[ Since then, almost every day after the boys’ division classes end, I’ve been taking alone walks through the school at night. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1287.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ
 "Hermes-san…" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My goal is to once again run into Hermes-san while she’s out walking on campus, like before. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san hasn’t been seen at school since the day of the Hakuyou Festival, but Hermes-san should know the reasons behind that. ]])

    MSG([[ To learn the truth of Daria-san’s confession that Akira says she heard at the hospital, I absolutely have to talk with Hermes-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】悲しみ
 (I have to talk to her, huh? That’s... just an excuse.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Honestly, even I understand. The real reason I’m looking for Hermes-san is because I want to meet her and talk. ]])

    MSG([[ When I helped with Hermes-san’s live performance rehearsal at the Hakuyou Festival, a name suddenly came to mind—"Arumeria." Those five letters just stuck in my head and won’t leave. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though I don’t remember it at all, that strange name feels nostalgic somehow, and I can’t help but be drawn to it. ]])

    MSG([[ But whenever I ask anyone who knows Hermes-san, the answer is always that they don’t recognize that name. ]])

    MSG([[ Getting the same result when I asked Akira too. ]])

    -- //SE：虫の鳴き声・ループ停止
STOP_SE("SEe005.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    -- //effect：セピア加工
    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1083.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】部屋着・通常
 "Arumeria? I’ve never heard of it. Is it the name of a hotel or something?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】私服・苦笑・汗
 "I know, right? Sorry for asking something weird." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】私服・悲しみ
 "It feels so nostalgic, but not just me—no one remembers it. What’s that about?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1084.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】部屋着・真剣
 "Hmmmmm... Friends, huh? Like the lonely Mina-chan before entering Yuriai Private Academy, who had no friends?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1085.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】部屋着・苦笑・汗
 "Have you ever heard of the phenomenon where kids play with imaginary friends? It’s called ‘imaginary friends.’" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】私服・焦り
 "I-it’s not imaginary...! At least, I think it isn’t." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1086.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】部屋着・ニヤリ
 "Just kidding. Well, it seems Hermes-san herself has heard the name ‘Arumeria.’" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】部屋着・通常
 "I’ll look into it along with the date of the big earthquake you can’t remember, Mina-chan. I’ve always been curious about why you hate earthquakes, you know." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

    -- //effect：なし
    -- //BG：メインストリート（夜）
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019cc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：虫の鳴き声・ループ開始
PLAY_SE("SEe005.wav",1000,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】通常
 "...Arumeria. Whose name could it be?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It sounds familiar from somewhere. It also feels nostalgic. ]])

    MSG([[ But still, nobody knows it, and I can’t picture a face either. The more I think about it, the deeper the mystery grows. ]])

    MSG([[ But what’s certain is that every time I hear this name, my chest warms up inside. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s mid-autumn now and the night breeze is getting colder, but my body doesn’t feel cold at all. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】苦笑
 "I hope I can see Hermes-san soon." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ And so I keep walking through the school at night, believing that meeting Hermes-san again will lead to something wonderful. ]])

    -- //SE：虫の鳴き声・ループ停止
STOP_SE("SEe005.wav")
    -- 　　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_02")
end
